import React, { useEffect, useState }from 'react' import HeartRating from "./HeartRating.js" import Navbar from "../components/Navbar" import './Diaries.css' export default function Diaries() { const [diaries, setDiaries] = useState([{ title: '', content: '', selectedHeart: 0, date: null, bodyChecked: '' }]) useEffect(() => { fetch('/diaries').then(res => { if(res.ok) { return res.json() } }).then(jsonRes => setDiaries(jsonRes)) }) return (

forMe.

{diaries.map(diary => <>

{diary.title}

{diaries.date ? `${diary.date.getDate()}/${diaries.date.getMonth()}/${diaries.date.getFullYear()}` : null}

Treat your body well?

{diary.bodyChecked}

{diary.content}

)}
) }
